synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blot Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir, along with special guest Garrett, delve into the complex topics of body image and the gym. They share personal experiences, challenge societal beauty standards, and encourage listeners to foster a healthier relationship with their bodies and fitness journeys.
quotes: The horror is persistent, but so do we.
You have to get into the thick of it to get out again.
Don't compare yourself to someone who's doing something that you can't even do.
It's important to not let your relationship with the gym become purely about channeling negative emotions.
If you want to make a change to your body, that should be encouraged, but donâ€™t hyper-fixate on minor insecurities.
Everyone is trying their best; don't be afraid to talk to people about where you are.
If you hate going to the gym, find something active that you enjoy.
Drink more water; it's the simplest way to improve your physical and mental health.
The strongest people in the gym are usually the nicest and most humble.
The only way to accept yourself is to get to the root cause of why you have a negative self-image.
